property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API name of the object that will be displayed in the table.

property.name: fieldSetApiName
property.label: Field Set API Name
property.description: API name of the field set that specifies which fields are displayed in the table.

property.name: whereConditions
property.label: SOQL Where Conditions
property.description: Optional where clause conditions for loaded data records. Example format: Status = 'New'

property.name: keyField
property.label: Key Field
property.description: Required field for better table performance. Associates each row with a unique Id.

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read-Only Table
property.description: If present, then all datatable fields are not editable.

property.name: hideCheckboxColumn
property.label: Hide Checkbox Column
property.description: If present, the checkbox column for row selection is hidden.

property.name: hideTableHeader
property.label: Hide Table Header
property.description: If present, the table header is hidden.

property.name: isUsedAsRelatedList
property.label: Is Used As Related List
property.description: If present, the table is wrapped with the correct page header to fit better into the related list layout.

property.name: showCard
property.label: Show Lightning Card
property.description: If present, the table is wrapped in a lightning card to fit better into the overall page layout.

property.name: cardIcon
property.label: Card Icon
property.description: If show card option is active,, the card icon is displayed in the header before the card title. It should contain the SLDS name of the icon. Specify the name in the format 'utility:down' where 'utility' is the category and 'down' the icon to be displayed.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: If show card option is active, The card title can include text and is displayed in the header above the table.

property.name: showRowNumberColumn
property.label: Show Row Number Column
property.description: If present, the row numbers are shown in the first column.

property.name: rowNumberOffset
property.label: Row Number Offset
property.description: Determines where to start counting the row number.

property.name: maxRowSelection
property.label: Maximum Row Selection
property.description: The maximum number of rows that can be selected.

property.name: showViewRowAction
property.label: Show View Row Action
property.description: If present, the last column contains a view record action.

property.name: showEditRowAction
property.label: Show Edit Row Action
property.description: If present, the last column contains a edit record action.

property.name: showDeleteRowAction
property.label: Show Delete Row Action
property.description: If present, the last column contains a delete record action.

property.name: columnWidthsMode
property.label: Column Width Mode
property.description: Specifies how column widths are calculated. Set to 'fixed' for columns with equal widths. Set to 'auto' for column widths that are based on the width of the column content and the table width.

property.name: minColumnWidth
property.label: Minimum Column Width
property.description: The minimum width for all columns. The default is 50px.

property.name: maxColumnWidth
property.label: Maximum Column Width
property.description: The maximum width for all columns. The default is 1000px.

property.name: resizeColumnDisabled
property.label: Disable Column Resizing
property.description: If present, column resizing is disabled.

property.name: defaultSortDirection
property.label: Default Sort Direction
property.description: Specifies the default sorting direction on an unsorted column. Valid options include 'asc' and 'desc'.

property.name: suppressBottomBar
property.label: Suppress Bottom Bar
property.description: If present, the footer that displays the Save and Cancel buttons is hidden during inline editing
